title: Keiko Bot
description: Keiko is a discord bot that helps manage the server.

heroSection.title: Keiko Bot
heroSection.description: A loyal Discord companion with moderations, utilities, and alerts! ‚ú®

aboutSection.title: Create an amazing community with Keiko!
aboutSection.description: Keiko is more than a bot, he is your adventure companion on Discord!

subtitles.title: Human and friendly support!
subtitles.description: With support always ready to lend a hand (paw) with a smile! Call us using /support!

subtitles.title: Made for you and your server sz
subtitles.description: From custom commands to welcome messages, Keiko adapts to your style.

advantageSection.title: With unique features!
advantageSection.description: Keiko has a variety of unique features! Here are some of our favorites

features.name: Welcome messages
features.description: Custom welcome messages for new members!

features.name: Multilanguage and translations
features.description: Support for multiple languages and message translations!

features.name: Easy management
features.description: Through Discord buttons, edit, pause, or disable features when necessary, with total flexibility and no complications.

howToUseSection.title: Set everything up directly through Discord
howToUseSection.description: See how easy it is to call Keiko and start having fun üê∂

steps.title: 1. Invite Keiko
steps.description: Add Keiko to your Discord server.

steps.title: 2. Use commands with /
steps.description: Use the /help command to see all the features.

steps.title: 3. Customize Keiko
steps.description: Activate the features you want and customize them to your liking.

featuresSection.title: Discover how Keiko can help you!
featuresSection.description: See some of the features that Keiko offers!
featuresSection.secondDescription: Moderator, assistant, and friend! Keiko does everything to make your community even more fun.

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Don't miss any live streams or videos! Keiko will notify you about everything.

features.name: Moderation
features.description: Blocks unwanted links, welcomes new members, assigns roles, and much more!

features.name: Translations
features.description: Break the language barrier! Keiko translates the messages for you.

features.name: Support
features.description: Always ready to help you with any questions or problems you may have.
